languages.text: "Да. Снаружи этого корабля есть только ничто. Иногда оно выплевывает сюда призраков, рожденных из праха, в который обратился мир. Мы с грустью встречаем вас, ибо скорбим по вам. Но, увы, ничем не в силах вам помочь, ибо вас — нет".

"Yes. There is only nothingness outside this ship. Sometimes it spits out ghosts born out of the world's ashes, and they wander in. The sight of you saddens us, for we mourn you. Alas, there is nothing we can do to help you, since you do not exist."
languages.original_text: "Да. Снаружи этого корабля есть только ничто. Иногда оно выплевывает сюда призраков, рожденных из праха, в который обратился мир. Мы с грустью встречаем вас, ибо скорбим по вам. Но, увы, ничем не в силах вам помочь, ибо вас — нет".

traits.locale_text: "Yes. There's only nothingness outside this ship. Sometimes it spits out ghosts born out of the world's ashes, and they wander in. The sight of you saddens us, for we mourn you. Alas, there's nothing we can do to help you, since you don't exist."
traits.speaker: Chief

traits.locale_text: "Yes. There is only nothingness outside this ship. Sometimes it spits out ghosts born out of the world's ashes, and they wander in. The sight of you saddens us, for we mourn you. Alas, there is nothing we can do to help you, since you do not exist."

traits.locale_text: "Yes. There is only nothingness outside this ship. Sometimes it spits out ghosts born out of the world's ashes, and they wander in. The sight of you saddens us, for we mourn you. Alas, there is nothing we can do to help you, since you do not exist."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: 「そのとおり。この船の外には無しかない。惑星の灰から時折吐き出される亡霊が外をさまよい歩く。あなたを見ると、私たちはその姿を悼み、悲しくなるのだ。無情なるかな、私たちからあなたにできることは何もない。あなたは存在していないのだから」
languages.original_text: "Yes. There is only nothingness outside this ship. Sometimes it spits out ghosts born out of the world's ashes, and they wander in. The sight of you saddens us, for we mourn you. Alas, there is nothing we can do to help you, since you do not exist."

traits.locale_text: 「そのとおり。この船の外には無しかない。惑星の灰から時折吐き出される亡霊が外をさまよい歩く。あなたを見ると、私たちはその姿を悼み、悲しくなるのだ。無情なるかな、私たちからあなたにできることは何もない。あなたは存在していないのだから」
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: “是的，这艘飞船之外什么都没有。有时候，会有鬼魂从世界的灰烬中冒出，游荡到船上。你的样子让我们不由得感到悲伤，我们为你哀悼，但我们无法向你施以援手，因为你根本就不存在。”
languages.original_text: "Yes. There is only nothingness outside this ship. Sometimes it spits out ghosts born out of the world's ashes, and they wander in. The sight of you saddens us, for we mourn you. Alas, there is nothing we can do to help you, since you do not exist."

traits.locale_text: “是的，这艘飞船之外什么都没有。有时候，会有鬼魂从世界的灰烬中冒出，游荡到船上。你的样子让我们不由得感到悲伤，我们为你哀悼，但我们无法向你施以援手，因为你根本就不存在。”
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: « Oui. En dehors de ce vaisseau règne le néant. Parfois, les cendres du monde donnent naissance à des fantômes qui parviennent à entrer ici. Vous voir me plonge dans une profonde tristesse, car nous portons votre deuil. Nous ne pouvons hélas rien faire pour vous aider, puisque vous n'existez pas. »
languages.original_text: "Yes. There is only nothingness outside this ship. Sometimes it spits out ghosts born out of the world's ashes, and they wander in. The sight of you saddens us, for we mourn you. Alas, there is nothing we can do to help you, since you do not exist."

traits.locale_text: « Oui. En dehors de ce vaisseau règne le néant. Parfois, les cendres du monde donnent naissance à des fantômes qui parviennent à entrer ici. Vous voir me plonge dans une profonde tristesse, car nous portons votre deuil. Nous ne pouvons hélas rien faire pour vous aider, puisque vous n'existez pas. »
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: «Así es. Fuera de esta nave solo hay la nada. A veces escupe fantasmas nacidos de las cenizas del mundo, y deambulan por aquí. Veros nos entristece, pues sentimos lástima por vosotros. Desgraciadamente, no podemos hacer nada por ayudaros, ya que no existís».
languages.original_text: "Yes. There is only nothingness outside this ship. Sometimes it spits out ghosts born out of the world's ashes, and they wander in. The sight of you saddens us, for we mourn you. Alas, there is nothing we can do to help you, since you do not exist."

traits.locale_text: «Así es. Fuera de esta nave solo hay la nada. A veces escupe fantasmas nacidos de las cenizas del mundo, y deambulan por aquí. Veros nos entristece, pues sentimos lástima por vosotros. Desgraciadamente, no podemos hacer nada por ayudaros, ya que no existís».
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Ja. Außerhalb dieses Schiffs gibt es nur Nichts. Manchmal spuckt es Geister aus, die aus der Asche der Welt geboren wurden, und sie wandern herein. Euer Anblick betrübt uns, denn wir trauern um Euch. Doch wir können nichts tun, um Euch zu helfen, denn Ihr existiert nicht."
languages.original_text: "Yes. There is only nothingness outside this ship. Sometimes it spits out ghosts born out of the world's ashes, and they wander in. The sight of you saddens us, for we mourn you. Alas, there is nothing we can do to help you, since you do not exist."

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Außerhalb dieses Schiffs gibt es nur Nichts. Manchmal spuckt es Geister aus, die aus der Asche der Welt geboren wurden, und sie wandern herein. Euer Anblick betrübt uns, denn wir trauern um Euch. Doch wir können nichts tun, um Euch zu helfen, denn Ihr existiert nicht."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Evet. Bu geminin dışında yalnızca hiçlik vardır. Bazen hiçlik, dünyanın küllerinden doğan hayaletler tükürür. Onlar da kendilerini burada bulur. Sizi görmek bize üzüntü veriyor, arkanızdan ağıt yakıyoruz. Size yardım edemiyoruz. Nihayetinde yoksunuz."
languages.original_text: "Yes. There is only nothingness outside this ship. Sometimes it spits out ghosts born out of the world's ashes, and they wander in. The sight of you saddens us, for we mourn you. Alas, there is nothing we can do to help you, since you do not exist."

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Bu geminin dışında yalnızca hiçlik vardır. Bazen hiçlik, dünyanın küllerinden doğan hayaletler tükürür ve onlar da kendilerini burada bulabilir. Sizi görmek bize üzüntü veriyor, arkanızdan ağıt yakıyoruz. Yine de elimizden size yardım etmek gelmiyor. Nihayetinde yoksunuz."
traits.speaker: Chief
